Player History

Released by Texas on 3/2/1965...
Drafted in 3rd round, 47th overall pick, by Kansas City in 1966...
Injured on 4/5/1971 with a Bruised Hand, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/11/1972 with a Bruised Foot, out for one week...

Injured on 7/31/1973 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 5/1/1976 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Chicago (A) on 7/10/1978...

Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...

Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...

Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
